programme.title: Part 1

programme.title: Part 2

programme.title: Superscopes

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E20, When a deadly house fire claims the life of a family in rural Oklahoma, investigators suspect foul play and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: The Widow And The Wolf/Texas Drifter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E04, After the murder of her aunt goes cold, a woman helps launch an advocate group that brings awareness to cases that have gone unsolved.

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Murder by Moonlight
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E09, Easter Sunday of 1992, the body of missing woman Lisa Ziegert is found in a field. The investigation yields hundreds of leads but no true suspect. After more than two decades on ice, the case is revived.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: One Tough Mother
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E18, In July 1997, the brutal murder of 19-year-old Tiffany Johnston rocks the small town of Bethany, Oklahoma. DNA points to her killer over a decade later and leads investigators across state lines.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E19, Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.
MST3K: Parts: The Clonus Horror, 19970607000000 +0000, Scientists run a clone farm for VIPs while Pearl and her goons are forced into babysitting omnipotent Space Children.

MST3K: Project Moonbase, 19900106000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots watch two more Commando Cody episodes and a film about a sabotaged space station. They also introduce their new product SPACOM to the Mads.
MST3K: Quest Of The Delta Knights, 19980926000000 +0000, Pearl sits in on part of this week's experiment as part of her annual review, and Leonardo da Vinci stops by.

MST3K: Racket Girls, 19700101000000 +0000, A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.

MST3K: Radar Secret Service, 19931218000000 +0000, Mike and the bots learn the art of safe driving and why you should pay attention at railroad crossings in the 1959 short, Last Clear Chance. Later, they watch government agents use radar technology to catch criminals in Radar Secret Service.

MST3K: Robot Holocaust, 19900113000000 +0000, After the ninth chapter of Radar Men From The Moon (1952) ends in technical difficulties, Joel and the bots must endure Robot Holocaust (1986). They pretend to be characters from the movie, but Tom Servo is the only one who is into it.

MST3K: Robot Monster: MST3K: Robot Monster, 19891223080000 +0000, The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.

MST3K: Being From Another Planet, 19920704000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots watch a re-edited version of Time Walker (1982) called "Being From Another Planet" in which a mummy awakened by a university team goes on a killing spree.
MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula, 20220506000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

Broadcasting Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Two exes compete for the same co-host position at the nation's favorite morning show in Manhattan. They'll both do what it takes to get ahead, but the fire that burned between them hasn't quite burned out.

Christmas in Conway, 20131201000000 +0000, Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

I'll Be Home for Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Jackie Foster has the perfect life until her dad Jack returns home and reluctantly agrees to spend Christmas with her and her daughter Gracie. Stars James Brolin, Mena Suvari and Giselle Eisenberg.

Duke, 20120428000000 +0000, When war veteran Terry Pulaski's dog Duke becomes ill, Terry seeks anonymous help from a nearby veterinary clinic. It soon becomes a community's quest to reunite Terry with his beloved dog. Stars Steven Weber.

Durango, 19990425000000 +0000, A young man goes on a cattle drive in Ireland in 1939 and must deal with a scheming cattle baron and tries to win the heart of a girl. Stars Brenda Fricker. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame.

Beverly Lewis' The Reckoning, 20151011000000 +0000, Shunned by the township she was raised in, a young Amish woman finds herself enjoying an affluent life in the secular world and engaged to a successful businessman. Until a long-lost love unexpectedly returns from her past.

August Creek, 20170807000000 +0000, Erica (Courtney Ford) left her Iowa hometown after she lost her soldier husband, but three years later she returns for her sister's wedding and has to face the love she left behind.

A Family Reunion, 20130629000000 +0000, In their youth, the Banner siblings made it big as a rock group, but at the height of their fame, the group fell apart. Now, fifteen years later the siblings reunite in their hometown to take care of their mother.

A Way Back Home, 20130601000000 +0000, When a young musician returns to his hometown at Christmastime, he repairs old wounds and learns the power of forgiveness. Inspired by the paintings of Norman Rockwell. Stars Danny Glover, Austin Stowell and Kayla Ewell.

All Yours, 20160402000000 +0000, Cass, a high-powered attorney and single mother of two, is on the hunt for a new nanny after her precocious kids ran off the last one. Stars Nicollette Sheridan, Dan Payne and Jayne Eastwood.

programme.title: Show And Tell
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E20, A boy mysteriously appears at SGC and pleas for help, claiming the Goa'uld are chasing him to find a race of invisible beings. But the SG-1 team doesn't know that the invisible aliens plan to destroy humanity…and their invasion has already begun!

Stargate SG-1, S02E21, A solar flare sends the SG-1 team back to 1969, where the U.S. military suspects the team of espionage. O'Neill and his team escape with two Woodstock-bound kids, desperate to find the Stargate before they're stuck in the psychedelic past forever.

programme.title: Out Of Mind
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E22, O'Neill awakens, seemingly from a 79-year cryogenic sleep, to find that his team is long dead. He soon discovers that it's all a setup and he is actually a prisoner of the Goa'uld, who intend to learn all his secrets…and then destroy him!

programme.title: Into The Fire
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E01, Hathor captures O'Neill and implants him with a destructive Goa'uld symbiote that could eventually kill him. Meanwhile, O'Neill's rescue party is defeated by Hathor's invincible energy barrier and time is running out. Is there a way to save O'Neill?

programme.title: Seth
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E02, When SG-1 hunts for a Goa'uld lord living on Earth, they discover this powerful alien in the form of a religious leader with an armed cult following. O'Neill faces off with both government agents and the cult in a clash that may destroy them all.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E05, On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.

programme.title: Tabula Rasa
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E06, With Atlantis plagued by an amnesia-causing virus, McKay wakes up with no idea who he is or what is going on. Following instructions from a video he recorded earlier, McKay frees himself and sets out to find the key to unlocking this mystery.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E07, Arriving on New Athos for an overnight visit, Teyla and Dr. Keller discover the entire settlement abandoned and their own lives in jeopardy from the Bola Kai, a fierce warrior tribe. The pair must avoid capture until Atlantis sends a search party.

programme.title: The Seer
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E08, With still no trace of the Athosians, Teyla requests an off-world visit to meet with a seer, Davos, who may be able to help her find her people. Meanwhile on Atlantis, Agent Woolsey arrives to observe and review Col. Carter.

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E09, After working for countless hours on the Replicator coding, Dr. McKay reluctantly admits that he needs help from his sister, Jeanie. But she goes missing, McKay travels to Earth determined to find her and uncover who is behind the kidnapping.

programme.title: This Mortal Coil
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E10, As Dr. McKay struggles to figure out why the stargate has been inoperable, a mysterious probe plunges into the city. A sweep of the probe offers McKay a shocking glimpse of nanite code before his diagnostic program crashes and all the data is lost.

programme.title: Be All My Sins Remember'd
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E11, Armed with the means to track Replicator ships, the Atlantis team strives to eliminate the Replicators once and for all. Now, the team rushes to evacuate those human settlements in the path of the advancing Replicator forces.

programme.title: Spoils Of War
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E12, The Atlantis long-range sensors detect the signal of a subspace tracking device familiar to Dr. McKay. The team follows to signal to a damaged hive ship drifting in space. Amidst the ship’s records, they discover references to a secret Wraith base.

programme.title: Air (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E01, When a military research base is attacked, a small group of civilians and military personnel escape on a ship into deep space. But divisions emerge between those who want to attempt a return to Earth and those who want to remain aboard the Destiny.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: Air (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E03, With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E04, The crew has been working throughout the night to try and determine why the ship’s power reserves are critically low. But when Destiny’s flight path towards a solar system reveals three planets, the entire crew hopes that one of them is habitable.

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E06, Valerie gets herself invited on a road trip with Kelly, Donna and Clare. Steve convinces Brandon to let a director film a movie at the Walsh house. Marchette tells Toni that Dylan is using her.

programme.title: Violated
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E07, Valerie accepts her marketing professor's invitation to a seminar. Bruno delivers a letter from Dylan to Toni. Steve and Clare quarrel after booking a motel room. Donna resists Ray's relentless attempts at a reconciliation.

programme.title: Gypsies, Cramps and Fleas
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E08, A fortune teller sets up shop at the Peach Pit for Halloween. In spite of her questionable credibility, her presence has an impact on many couples.

programme.title: Earthquake Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E09, Dylan asks Toni to marry him. An earthquake rocks the major Los Angeles area, spooking Colin. Donna sees her mother in a photograph of the 1969 Rose Court contestants, but Felice refuses to explain herself.

programme.title: One Wedding and a Funeral
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.title: Offensive Interference
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.title: Breast Side Up
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Chp Burning Car/Austin Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E130, A rear-end collision causes a car to burst into flames/Cameras follow a special unit in Houston who deal with domestic violence.

programme.title: New Daddy Crash/Bubba Saves Chewy
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E285, Two men discover an unconscious man trapped inside a cab. A family's dog is trapped inside the home when it catches fire.

programme.title: Helicopter Horse/Kids in Smoke
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E251, A horse loses its footing and throws a rider off 300 feet down onto a ledge. A 12-year-old babysitter notices black smoke.

programme.title: Mom Sleeping/Cop’s Son Shooting
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E353, A 3-year old girl calls 911 when her mother loses consciousness. A rookie police officer confronts his worst fear during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Motel Hostage/Endometriosis Mom
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E314, Police pursue two men who robbed a motel. A 4-year-old girl calls 911 when her mother becomes unconscious.

programme.title: 3 Parachutes/Snake Baby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E154, While practicing skydiving, a man's parachute becomes unusable. A young boy is bitten in the backyard by a venomous cottonmouth snake.

programme.title: Hayloft Hazard/Special Olympian Hero
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E303, A girl playing with a rope slips off bail of hay. A man is severely stung by yellow jackets.

programme.title: Security Bar/BB Gun Blast
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E227, A family is awakened by their house on fire, but the father and daughter are trapped by security bars over the bedroom window. A woman witnesses her 6-year-old shot by a bee gun blast.

programme.title: White Eagle/Ando the Dog
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E128, Vicki White Eagle has a car accident and becomes impaled by a piece of fence/A hit and run accident escalates.

programme.title: Accidental Gunshot/Water Monitor
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E243, A teenager is accidentally shot by a friend on a camping trip. A Miami couple finds a six food lizard wrapped around the engine block of their car.

programme.title: Snowmobile Sis/Fast Break
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E351, Two sisters are injured when the snowmobile they're riding flips over. A first-aid volunteer call 911 when a basketball player collapses during a game.

programme.title: Xmas Tree, Part 2/6TH Grade CPR
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E225, The continued story of a 16-year-old who falls from a 50 ft. pine while trying to cut the top off. An 11-year-old initiates CPR when his teacher collapses.

programme.title: Beachblast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E06, To sponsor the Special Olympics at the beach, Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast:" a live televised tournament. After being evicted from his apartment, Cody moves in with CJ and Caroline, creating a surplus of sexual tension.

programme.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E07, CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E08, Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E09, Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E10, After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E11, Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.

programme.title: Bachlor of the Month
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E12, Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazine's Bachelor of the Month, a designation that leads to wild complications. Stephanie is making plans for her wedding to Tom, but her sister Caroline keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E13, Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers, with Mitch and Neely along for help. All is going well until they get trapped in a hurricane and the ship starts sinking!

programme.title: Talk Show
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E14, Mitch gets his “15 minutes of fame” when he rescues Jay Leno from choking, and a female talk show host from drowning. Caroline and CJ adopt a stray dog swimming in the ocean that mystically reminds them of Stephanie.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E15, After Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning, Caroline seeks out the enigmatic, mysterious youth who helped her rescue one of the boys. Neely's ex-husband returns, complicating her life.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E16, Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his home borough in East LA arrive at Baywatch for community service. Meanwhile, Neely suspects Mitch and Samantha are becoming more than coworkers.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E17, When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives together rather than end their romance. Meanwhile, Cody encounters a mermaid while diving, and of course no one believes him… except CJ.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E18, While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash. They rescue the pilot, who reveals that he was transporting a canister that contains a deadly virus. Meanwhile, the team must shut down an illegal nude beach.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E19, Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the angry and bitter mother of a drowning victim. CJ babysits a neighbor’s newborn and realizes she wants to be a mother. But is Cody ready to be a father?

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E20, CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World. While there, Samantha gets the idea to promote lifeguarding by planning a Baywatch-theme stunt show at Sea World.

programme.title: Golden Girls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E21, A crazed young woman is causing trouble on the Venice Boardwalk and Neely suspects it is more than meets the eye. Meanwhile, Newman meets his dream woman – who doesn’t speak English.

programme.title: Nevermore
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E22, A mysterious, disfigured man whom the public dubs "the phantom lifeguard," is secretly saving people and sending love notes to CJ. When CJ goes missing the team sets out to find her and the “phantom.”
